name: Eight (AguaHervida)
description:
Eight needs your help!

A shooter without shooting, feel the pain of the bullets in your body and use these small projectiles to defeat the creatures that come for you!

How to play:
  • Use WASD to move.
  • L to shoot all accumulated bullets.
Gameplay:

Eight is someone very unusual, he can quickly change his magnetic field allowing him to repel certain objects that are on his body. On this occasion Eight needs your help, rare beings are appearing near the mountain where Eight lives, help him survive and count how many bullets can you support!

This game was made for the GMTK Game(jam) 2018.
